summary: The customer is having trouble with their Contoso Wireless 42-inch flat-screen 4K Ultra HD TV (model number CTV42H2D3 and serial number 0Z4CTTV122149937X9). The customer has tried to power up the TV but nothing is happening. The agent has recommended that the customer take the TV to an authorized Contoso Wireless service center to have it properly diagnosed and repaired.
